m_szDocTitle: Patent US6358643 - Liquid electrolyte lithium-sulfur batteries - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Liquid electrolyte lithium-sulfur batteries US 6358643 B1 Abstract A high performance lithium-sulfur battery cell includes the following features: (a) a negative electrode including a metal or an ion of the metal; (b) a positive electrode comprising an electronically conductive material; and (c) a liquid catholyte including a solvent and dissolve electrochemically active material comprising sulfur in the form of at least one of a sulfide of the metal and a polysulfide of the metal. Such battery cells are characterized by an energy density, calculated based upon a laminate weight, of at least a
